reviews.title: Super fun, safe, and memorable day on the sand dunes!
reviews.text: Rafa and his Sandride Lima crew were amazing! We started with an early 7am pick up from our hotel in a nice clean comfortable SUV. An hour later we were getting our boots and board sized then we hoped into a Toyota Landcruiser and headed out to the desert.  They let us pick the music and within 40 min we were in the middle of the sand dunes.They did a wonderful job at starting us off slowly on some smaller dunes until we got comfortable with riding and turning. Driving on the soft sand is not easy but they did an awesome job getting us most of the way up the dune after each run so we only had to walk a short distance to the top.They also took photos and video of us while riding which made for some super memorable photos.Would 100% recommend and book Sandride Lima again!

reviews.title: Lima Sandboarding
reviews.text: One of the best days I've had ever......and I've done alot of cool stuff!!   The guys were amazing!  10000% recommend!Rafa and Alfonso were so patient and took some amazing video footage of me and my friends!

reviews.title: A Must Try Experience!
reviews.text: Awesome trip! If youâre looking for a unique experience during your PerÃº visit this is it! Great pre-trip communication, helpful instruction during trip and friendly trip leaders. All around great experience!

reviews.title: Such a fun experience!
reviews.text: A must do in Lima! We had best time! Alfonso and Javier were great. Even with no experience at all, they show you exactly how to sandboard.

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text: Absolutely phenomenal experience. They catered to every need the entire time and gave me tailored feedback to improve my riding. They are a fun bunch and we had a great time boarding and off roading a bit in the 4x4 absolutely will be back for more.

reviews.title: Out of this world experience!
reviews.text: The experience was incredible! Itâs really crazy to be out in huge dunes so close to the city! The team took super good care of us and gave us tips and tricks along the way. The videos were really great too!

reviews.title: Great time!
reviews.text: Great experience. Alfonso and Javier were great guides! It was well worth it! We did about 8 or 9 runs and got great photos and videos

reviews.title: Half day sand boarding tour
reviews.text: Incredible trip and the guide/tutor (Alfonso) was excellent. Explained everything perfectly and took awesome pics ð¸

reviews.title: Unreal
reviews.text: Great trip for anyone and everyone, very hospitable and professional. Great videos and pictures, guides were very knowledgeable and English was great!

reviews.title: Amazing Experience
reviews.text: Amazing experience! I had no sandboarding experience, but the team was so helpful and patient! Seeing the dunes was incredible. Would highly recommend
